Description: Company of Heroes Ã¢â€žÂ¢ 2: The offensive in the Ardennes - an amazing new chapter in the series has earned high marks. This exciting campaign continues the theme of the Second World War. You will find yourself in the midst of the battle, which Winston Churchill described as "... undoubtedly the greatest American battle in this war." In America, this battle is called "Battle of the Bulge."
Take command of US troops be disadvantaged tactical situation in difficult terrain under unexpected and merciless blows of the German High Command "West". Take a look at the dramatic events of the Battle of the Bulge eyes of three different commanders; Feel personally the conditions in which they had to fight, and assess the impact of their decisions on the outcome of these battles. The brutal reality of war is that danger lurks all, and your company - is no exception. Become a witness of their heroism in an unequal battle and fight for strategic Ardennes.

Game Features:
Nonlinear CAMPAIGN
explore strategic meta-map with the key points of the Battle of the Bulge. Select a sequence of game missions, routed a strong German army and turn the tide of battles.
18 BRAND NEW SCENARIOS
Spend the Bulge dynamic campaign of 11 missions and 7 clashes based on real events of the Battle of the Bulge. During the campaign, before you put the bonus objectives that change with each new game. Now the campaign played even less like one another.
3 WORSHIP company
Take command of a multi-purpose airborne division, mechanized infantry and relentless support units, which causes great damage to the enemy. For each mission you can choose one of the units. Each can command a company of three officers: each of them has its own style of fighting, vision and ability.
Result has the value
Be careful with the strategic decisions, because their consequences and the overall health of a company remain unchanged between missions. Status veterans will help improve the efficiency of the entire company, and lost units reduce the overall health of a company. Improper management of resources can lead to the loss of the campaign. Your decisions depends on the outcome of the battle!
SETTINGS
4 Complete the unique abilities of their mouth 6 improvements. Unique skill tree allows you to make 72 improvements at various levels. The player can develop a specialization of their commanders during the campaign.
